app_descript:
ShutEye: Your Personal Sleep Expert

Brief: ShutEye is an all-encompassing sleep aid and tracker designed to help you fall asleep, stay asleep, and wake up refreshed. It offers a bevy of tools including a vast selection of sleep sounds, personalized mix of ambient noises, bedtime stories, a sleep cycle tracker, and a smart alarm to enhance your sleep quality.
